summary:
Previous Assignments:
 - Senior R&D Manager at Philips (healthtech)
 - Integral Project Manager and Operations Manager at Philips Lighting
 - Deployment of large scale multi-site transformational projects, New Business Creation at Philips Lighting
 - Competition Benchmarking, Strategy & Business Intelligence Leader at Philips Lighting
 - Novel Ultrasound Transducer Development for Philips Healthcare 
 - Cutting Edge R&D projects at Philips Research
 - Fundamental & Exploratory Research on EOS/ESD reliability in CMOS/MEMS devices

Specialties: Project and Program Management, Leadership, Business Creation and Development, Innovation Management, Scientific Research, R&D Strategy and Market Intelligence, Technology development for societal benefit, International education and outlook, Building and managing cross-functional teams, multi-lingual skills and multi-cultural network, Hardworking, Motivated and Eager to Win

Expertise Domains:-  Complex Project & Program Management (PDLM, AGILE, SAFE), New Business Development (NBX, VPC, AD), Solid State LED Lighting, Drivers and Electronics, System-level Architecture, Quality and Validation, Medical Devices. Microelectronics/MEMS Design & Characterization, Semiconductors, Reliability Physics, Testing and Failure Analysis, Electrostatic Discharge (ESD) Protection, Electronic Packaging & assembly, BOM cost modelling and reverse engineering,

awards.title: Doctoraat Ingenieurswetenschappen (PhD in Engineering)
awards.description: Defended my PhD thesis on " Electrostatic Discharge (ESD) in Microelectromechanical Systems (MEMS)" on 22 Dec 2011. This PhD research work was performed at IMEC (www.imec.be) in co-operation with the groups of Prof. dr. Ingrid De Wolf and Prof. dr. Ir. Guido Groeseneken.

profile_positions.description:
Passionate about leadership & change, and advocating an entrepreneurial way of working, I am a vastly experienced project/program manager in the Philips Innovation & Strategy Organization. I lead large programs, global in nature and scope, with significant R&D Innovation and/or strategic transformation objectives. Some projects/programs I have managed include:
  - Enterprise-level quality and competence building
  - Next generation premium CT scanners and detection technology (Philips CT/AMI)
  - Transition of Intense Pulse Epilation (IPL) Business to Medical (EUMDR/FDA)
  - Global ventilator production ramp-up against COVID-19 (Philips SRC/HRC)
  - ISCV program in  Cardiology Informatics, Philips. (Philips EDI)
  - Equipment Manufacturing for Philips Personal Health factories(Philips PH)
  - Service and Solutions offering for Philips Healthcare (ECR)
  - High tech system development and commercialization for startups/ventures
  - Manufacturing process development in MEMS foundry
profile_positions.title: Director Project & Program Management

profile_positions.description: Integral Project Manager within BG Professional Europe & Greater China & Growth Markets, Signify (Formerly known as Philips Lighting). Work content involved leading large complex end-to-end projects (idea to market) involving huge CAPEX and large stakeholder networks. Inspiring element was building teams and developing people together.
profile_positions.title: Outsourced Operations Manager

profile_positions.description:
Integral Project Manager responsible for developing luminaires for the professional market with outsourced suppliers and managing a variety of projects including: New Product Realization, Cost reductions, Value engineering, Supplier changes and component changes. 
Outsourced Operations (OO) is the central organization for finished luminaires for Supply Group Professional Europe, GBU Professional, Philips Lighting co-developing luminaires with suppliers and managing operations on these products, and currently responsible for almost half of the products being sold in Europe.
profile_positions.title: Outsourced Operations Manager, BG Professional Europe

profile_positions.description:
Expertise & Leading project activities in Strategic Technology Benchmarking, Competitor Portfolio Analysis, Supply chain & Market Intelligence, Connected LED Lighting & App-based Systems and Novel LED Lighting architectures at Philips
Strategic deep-dives into the future of Manufacturing, and the impact of digital technologies (eg: 3D-printing, robotics and automated assembly) into the end-to-end process flow, exploring novel go-to market channels and cost drivers in a revolutionized value-chain for future products.
profile_positions.title: Technology Benchmarking Leader

profile_positions.description:
Worked in the Device Integration Technologies (previously Electronic Packaging & Thin Films) group at Philips Research Eindhoven.
Some of my activities included:

 1. Technology Benchmarking of the Solid State Lighting (SSL) industry (including LED luminaires and modules) across Business Groups & Product/ Market segments worldwide (Philips vs Competition)
 2. Reliability deep-dives and technology improvement in next generation ultrasound imaging systems for Philips Healthcare (BG Ultrasound)
 3. Outside-in innovation & re-use of existing technology to solve unmet societal needs in emerging markets and developing nations

Previous Projects include:
 4. Novel and breakthrough interconnect solutions (both die-attach and package-attach) for advanced LED lighting systems to operate with high reliability at elevated operating temperatures and/or in high brightness applications
 5. Advanced packaging techniques and electronic drivers for LED-based Lighting solutions
profile_positions.title: Research Scientist

profile_positions.description:
During this period, I investigated ESD as a reliability issue in MEMS devices. I worked towards investigating the various failure mechanisms in MEMS during ESD stress, classifying the ESD failure levels for MEMS and also designing for better ESD robustness and ESD protection for these devices.
I am also a speaker and presenter at major international conferences in semiconductor devices and Microsystems. 
I am a reviewer of technical papers and EOS/ESD Symposium Technical Program Committee Member for 2010 & 2011.
I am interested in the application of present technology in new domains (Energy & Health care)
profile_positions.title: Researcher in ESD & MEMS

profile_positions.description: Investigating failure physics and reliability of microsystems, MEMS design/fabrication and characterization, electrostatic discharge (ESD) testing and protection design, instrumentation and building test setups, analysis/inspection with SEM/Profilometry, writing technical papers, publishing in journals and attending/presenting at conferences, industry/academic affiliations, paper review, TPC and networking.
profile_positions.title: PhD Student

volunteer_experiences.description: ROSE vzw is a voluntary non profit organization, based in Leuven Belgium whose mission is to generate funds and support primary education of under-privileged children in developing countries. The final goal is to help target projects attain self-sustained development. More info on ROSE activities can be found at http://www.rosevzw.net

volunteer_experiences.role: Class Representative & Moderator Alumni Batch of 2006
volunteer_experiences.description: Keeping in touch with alumni of IIT Bombay, facilitating as liaison between IITBAA and alumni worldwide for batch of 2006, especially in the EU/Benelux Area, networking and organizing fund-raising for my Alma Mater (IIT Bombay), moderating Batch Groups, Mentoring students via the ASMP programme
